mainSequence.step: Alice chooses existing or add new device option in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 provides instructions for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 sends add request and necessary data.
Edge Agent 1 stores the verification key in the wallet.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to the policy registry.
Agent 2 stores the data in the wallet.
